###4.19
Multiprocess Debugging
ProDev WorkShop supports multiprocess debugging, including processes spawned using fork or sproc.
Drag your mouse over the window to learn its features.  Click on the bottom right arrow to continue.
identifies the process
identifies the parent process
indicates state of the process
identifies the process by file name
shows the current function and program counter (PC) for any stopped process
The Admin menu lets you perform general functions.
The Config menu lets you set preferences regarding relationships between parent and child processes.
The Process menu lets you add or remove processes.
The Process control area lets you control each process in the list.
The Process list area identifies each process by ID and name, the parent process ID, the state, and the current function and PC for any stopped processes.
